data.name: Template_AfterLanding
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome {IF DESTINATION_CITY}to {DESTINATION_CITY}{END}. {IF SCHED_ARR_LOCAL_24H}The local time is {SCHED_ARR_LOCAL_24H}.{END} The cabin crew will shortly be leaving their seats to perform safety-related duties. However, we ask that you remain seated until the fasten seatbelt sign has been switched off. Portable electronic devices for messaging, calls or internet access may now be used. Please make sure you take all your personal belongings with you, checking in the seat pocket, underneath the seat and in the overhead lockers. Do take care opening the overhead lockers as items may have moved during flight. Smoking is not permitted until you reach a designated smoking area. On behalf of the captain and the crew, it has been our pleasure looking after you today. Our ground crew will help you complete your journey.

data.name: Template_ArmDoors
data.value: Cabin crew, arm doors and cross check.

data.name: Template_AfterTakeoff
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, please keep your seatbelt fastened whilst the seatbelt sign is on. We recommend that you keep your seatbelt fastened whenever you are seated. Toilets are located at each end of the cabin. Remember that smoking is not permitted at any time. This includes e-cigarettes. In just a few moments, we will commence our in-flight service, offering you the chance to choose from our fresh selection available today. Full details can be found in your in-flight brochure. You can also purchase a selection of hot beverages together with drinks and snacks from the bar. We accept all major credit and debit cards. If we can be of any further assistance, just ask us as we join you in the cabin shortly.

data.name: Template_BoardingComplete
data.value: Cabin crew, boarding is now complete. Any remaining ground crew, please leave the aircraft.

data.name: Template_BoardingWelcome
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome on board. {IF AIRLINE_NAME}This is a {AIRLINE_NAME}{END}{IF FLIGHT_NUMBER_DIGITS} flight {FLIGHT_NUMBER_DIGITS}{END}{IF DESTINATION_CITY} to {DESTINATION_CITY}{END}. To help us ensure an on-time departure, please keep the aisle clear while boarding. {IF SCHED_DEP_LOCAL_24H}Our scheduled departure is {SCHED_DEP_LOCAL_24H}.{END} {IF FLIGHT_TIME}Flying time today is {FLIGHT_TIME}.{END} Please place your large bags into the overhead lockers, wheels first, and keep your small items under the seat in front of you. If you are seated in an emergency exit row or a front row bulkhead seat, all of your items must be placed into an overhead locker. Once you have safely stowed your cabin bag, please take your seat and fasten your seatbelt. This is a no smoking service. Thank you for observing this policy.

data.name: Template_BoardingWelcomePilot
data.value:
##Role: Pilot
Hello from the flight deck, this is your captain speaking. Welcome aboard. We're just finishing up boarding and expect to be on our way shortly. I'll be back to update you on our progress during the flight, but in the mean time please make yourselves comfortable, and thanks for flying with us today.

data.name: Template_CabinDimTakeoff
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, we will shortly be dimming the lights. You can turn on a reading light using the controls above your head or in your armrest.

data.name: Template_CallCabinSecureLanding
data.value: Hi Captain, the cabin is now secure for landing.

data.name: Template_CallCabinSecureTakeoff
data.value: Hi Captain, the cabin is now secure for takeoff.

data.name: Template_CrewSeatsLanding
data.value:
##Role: Pilot
Cabin crew must now be seated for landing. Thank you.

data.name: Template_CrewSeatsTakeoff
data.value:
##Role: Pilot
Cabin crew seats for takeoff.

data.name: Template_CruiseElapsed50Percent
data.value: We'll shortly be starting our in-flight service. Full details can be found in your in-flight brochure. You can also purchase a selection of hot beverages together with drinks and snacks from the bar. We accept all major credit and debit cards. Thank you.

data.name: Template_DepartureDelayed
data.value:
##Role: Pilot
Ladies and gentlemen, an update from the flight deck. {IF DEP_STATUS}{DEP_STATUS}{END} {IF DEP_LATE}(currently {DEP_LATE} behind schedule){END}. {IF SCHED_DEP_LOCAL_24H}Our scheduled departure time is {SCHED_DEP_LOCAL_24H}.{END} We'll keep you updated and aim to get underway as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.

data.name: Template_DescentSeatbelts
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, we will shortly be landing {IF DESTINATION_CITY}in {DESTINATION_CITY}{END}. Please ensure your cabin bag is safely stowed with your laptop inside. Your tray table must be stowed, armrests down and window blinds open. You now need to be seated with your seatbelt fastened ready for landing. Please help us by handing in any rubbish, newspapers or magazines that you do not want to keep. The toilets are no longer in service. Thank you.

data.name: Template_DisarmDoors
data.value: Cabin crew, disarm doors.

data.name: Template_DisembarkStarted
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, when disembarking, please take care and hold onto the handrails while walking down the stairs. Please ensure that you supervise your children and for your own safety, do not walk underneath the wing.

data.name: Template_FastenSeatbelt
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, the fasten seatbelt sign has now been turned on. Please return to your seat and fasten your seatbelt.

data.name: Template_PreSafetyBriefing
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, please observe the cabin crew member closest to you as we are about to demonstrate the safety features of our aircraft. Thank you.

data.name: Template_SafetyBriefing
data.value: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome aboard. Please pay attention to illuminated signs and crew instructions, including the following safety procedures. The safety card found in your seat pocket contains important information about exit locations, oxygen masks, life jackets, and the brace position. There are emergency exits located at the front, over the wings, and at the rear. Please locate your nearest exit; it may be behind you. Emergency lighting will guide you to an exit. In an emergency, leave all baggage on board. Your seatbelt fastens, adjusts, and releases as shown. It must be fastened whenever the seatbelt signs are on, and we recommend that you keep it fastened at all times. If the air supply fails, masks will drop from above you. Pull a mask towards you to start the oxygen. Put the mask over your nose and mouth and breathe normally. Hold the mask in place with the strap, pull on each side to adjust, and put on your own mask before helping others. Your tray table must now be stowed, armrests down, window blinds open, and seatbelt fastened. Thank you for flying with us today.

data.name: Template_TopOfClimbPilot
data.value:
##Role: Pilot
Ladies and gentlemen, from the flight deck this is your captain speaking. We've now reached our cruising altitude of {IF CRUISE_ALTITUDE_FT}{CRUISE_ALTITUDE_FT}{END} feet and things are looking great. {IF DESTINATION_CITY}We're on our way to {DESTINATION_CITY}{END}{IF FLIGHT_TIME}, with an estimated total flight time of {FLIGHT_TIME}{END}. We'll keep you updated on our progress throughout the flight. In the meantime, sit back, relax, and enjoy the service on board. On behalf of the crew, we're glad to have you with us today. Thanks.

data.name: Template_TopOfDescentPilot
data.value:
##Role: Pilot
Ladies and gentlemen, from the flight deck this is your captain speaking. We're beginning our descent into {IF DESTINATION_CITY}{DESTINATION_CITY}{END}. {IF DESTINATION_WEATHER}The weather at our destination is currently {DESTINATION_WEATHER}{END}{IF DESTINATION_TEMPERATURE}, with temperatures around {DESTINATION_TEMPERATURE}{END}. {IF SCHED_ARR_LOCAL_24H}Our estimated arrival time is {SCHED_ARR_LOCAL_24H} local time.{END} {IF ARR_STATUS}{ARR_STATUS}{END} We're glad to have you with us today so from all the crew, thank you for flying with us.
